page.enlisting:
* “Agency-tracked” means certain HR Management Report data that must be tracked by each agency because it is not available in the central system. ** In addition, agencies send copies of their internal GMAP reports on HR Management Report to DOP as they are completed. * “Agency-tracked” means certain HR Management Report data that must be tracked by each agency because it is not available in the central system.
